/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the cityscape. 

Vehicles of various types and colors are scattered across the road, indicating a busy time of day. Among them, a large truck with a green tarp covering its cargo stands out, hinting at the daily life and activities in the city. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting shadows and adding depth to the scene. Despite the busyness, there's a sense of order and rhythm to the scene, a typical day in the life of a city like Beijing.
